pictbridge: Yes, Exif Print, Print Image Matching III, DPOF setting
metering: Yes, 1200 Zone Evaluative Metering, Metering Range ( 2EV - 17EV, ISO 100 equivalent with F1.4 lens )
memorycardtype: Memory Stick Pro Duo / Memory Stick PRO-HG Duo / SD / SDHC / SDXC
lenstype: Sony A-mount lens, Minolta and Konica Minolta AF lenses
flashmodes: Auto (Flash-off), Auto, Fill Flash, Red-eye Reduction, Rear Sync, Slow Sync, High-speed Sync
imagestablizer: Yes, Image-sensor shift mechanism, Compensation ( Approx. 2.5 - 4.5 EV decrease in shutter speed (varies according to conditions and lens used) )
whitebalancing: Auto, Daylight, Shade, Cloudy, Incandescent, Fluorescent (Warm White, Cool White, Day White), Flash, Colour Temperature 2500 to 9900 k with 15-step, Colour Filter (G7 to M7, A7 to B7), Custom, AWB Micro Adjustment
imageformat: JPEG, DCF 2.0, EXIF 2.3, RAW (ARW 2.3 Format), RAW + JPEG, MPO
otherfocusfeatures: Focus Modes ( Single-shot AF, Auto AF, Continuous AF, Manual Focus ), Focus Type ( TTL phase-detection system ), Sensitivity Range ( -1EV - 18EV, ISO 100 equivalent ), AF Illuminator ( Range: 1 - 5m )
dustreduction: Yes, Charge protection coating on low pass filter and image-sensor shift mechanism
operatingsystem: Windows XP SP3 (32-bit), Windows Vista SP2, Windows 7 SP1, MAC OS X 10.3, MAC OS X 10.4, MAC OS X 10.5, MAC OS X 10.6
shootingmodes: Exposure Bracketing (3 continuous exposures selectable, in 0.3 or 0.7-stop increment ), White Balance Bracketing ( 3 frames, H/L selectable )
display: 3 inch TFT Xtra Fine LCD with TruBlack Technology
